text: Stuart Parkinson (31 May 1929 - 25 October 1989) was a British alpine skier and bobsledder. He competed in the men's downhill at the 1948 Winter Olympics. He also competed in the two-man and four-man bobsleigh events at the 1956 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:1989 deaths Category:British male alpine skiers Category:British male bobsledders Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Great Britain Category:Olympic bobsledders of Great Britain Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Bobsledders at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from London
title: Stuart Parkinson
